name: videoloop
description: Generate animated video loop from static try-on image

360_v1.base_prompt: Model does a fast fashionable 360 degree turn, counter-clockwise, and ends in the same pose as they started.

motion.speed: fast and graceful, 360 degrees, counter-clockwise, slower at the end
motion.smoothness: fluid continuous motion, no jerky movements
motion.loop_friendly: end pose is identical to start pose

style.quality: high quality video, smooth frame interpolation

preservation.clothing: garments move naturally with body rotation
preservation.expression: neutral pleasant expression, minimal facial movement
preservation.camera: fixed static camera, no panning or zooming

idle_v1.base_prompt: Subtle idle animation of {subject}, gentle breathing motion, natural micro-movements

motion.loop_friendly: seamless loop, no visible cut point

showcase_v1.base_prompt: Fashion showcase video of {subject}, dynamic but controlled movement highlighting the outfit

style.lighting: dynamic lighting that flatters the garment

negative_prompt: jerky motion, sudden movements, morphing, distortion, flickering, unstable video, face changes, body deformation, floating objects, glitches, artifacts, low frame rate
